Text: IPCs OASIS and Etag Servers on PPTcustomers and counterparts As of Sunday November our OASIS and Etag servers are running on PPT The only business practices we are changing now is that our OASIS transmission products are all based upon PPT Our scheduling systemetag server is also running on PPT However we can and will continue to accept etags in any timezone as long as the profile has a valid OASIS reservation We will also continue to check out with our counterparties in the time zone that we have historically used with each neighboring control area The cost for a tall skinny latte and a plain bagel with light cream cheese for our programmer If you have any questions please give me a call at Thanks Lisa

RE Meeting Cc Bill NonPrivilegedpst The th works for me also See you there Lisa Original Message From Harshbarger Robert mailto Sent Wednesday June AM To DEMPSEY JERRY Ellingson Mons Fotiou Demetrios Grow Lisa HoldenBaker Susan Smith Chris Tilghman Carmine Underwood John Williams Bill Cc Hackney Mark Subject Meeting Based on what Ive seen so far looks like June th Based on that I have tentatively booked a room am to pm at the PDX Conference Center Portland OR If you havent been there before theres diagrammap at webpopCONFERHTM Some of the items for an agenda Elimination of preschedule flag Time table times refer to prevailing time of the sinkload control area Preschedule items Realtime items There are more specific items I just havent had enough coffee yet A real agenda out next week Robert Harshbarger Puget Sound Energy OASIS Trading Manager desk cell
